text: Richard Green Spurling (1857 – 1935) was an American Christian minister. Born in Monroe County, Tennessee, he was the founder of the Church of God. His father, Richard Spurling (1810 – 1891) was an ordained Baptist elder, who presided over the founding of the church on August 10, 1886. R. G. Spurling was chosen as its minister and ordained a month later. ==References== Category:1857 births Category:1935 deaths Category:People from Monroe County, Tennessee
title: R. G. Spurling
